name: Supernova Gunner
description:
Average Playtime: 5-10 Minutes

Defeat enemy ships by shooting to the beat! 

Supernova Gunner is a short, rhythm-based, top-down shooter.

Shoot to the beat to fill your combo meter and improve your score. Go for the S Rank to become the best gunner in the galaxy!

Porter Weston: Art and Programming

Sam Keddington: Music and SFX

ANY constructive feedback is appreciated! This is my first project, so apologies for any clunky controls, performance issues, or bugs you may encounter.
